scripts.preinstall: echo "[root] Use root scripts; app dependencies are managed in app/. Avoid running npm ci in root."
scripts.lint: node -e "const p=require('./app/package.json'); if(!p.scripts||!p.scripts.lint){console.log('No lint script in app/, skipping.'); process.exit(0)}" && npm --prefix app run lint
scripts.ci: npm --prefix app run build && npm --prefix app run test:run
